title: xXx Theatrical PG13 (2002) 1080p Rifftrax 6ch 2ch v2
description:
xXx.Theatrical.PG13.2002.1080p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch.v2.mkv

DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 MOVIE PLUS RIFFTRAX
FOR MOVIE ONLY SOUND SWITCH TO TRACK2 FOR 5.1 OR TRACK3 FOR 2.0

THIS IS THE THEATRICAL PG-13 VERSION

xXx (2002)
video: 1920X800 AVC
audio1 (default): movie plus Rifftrax AAC 2.0
audio2: just movie AC3 5.1
audio3: just movie AAC 2.0
subs: English built in, off by default, not hard coded, software switchable
intro: 1s after the last riff comment
Rifftrax released 2006.09.06 2h04m08s 2,866,049,094bytes
Movie IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0295701/

This xXx version2 has the following changes:
* newly remastered sound using Chris's Dynamic Compressor on the movie and Level Speech on the riffs (V1 was a mux of a non-bsg4you riff mix)
* the movie and riff volumes are higher and well matched plus the movie is better ducked during loud scenes
* v1 was 1280x528 while v2 is 1920x800
* v1's video was darker with saturated colors while v2 has better contrast and has color true to the blu-ray
* a 2.0 Movie sound track was added
* the 5.1 Movie and 2.0 Movie sound levels were raised
* the chapter points and names were corrected plus new chapters were added

This is a remux with the Rifftrax commentary added as the default audio track. The Rifftrax audio track has been newly remastered to ensure the riff comments are just loud enough to be clear when the movie is loud and not too loud when the movie is quiet. Please leave any feedback regarding the Rifftrax audio remastering.

Big thanks to the posters of the 1080p/5.1 encodes of the movies, the subs and the chapters.

If this Rifftrax was enjoyable, you haven't paid for it and you have a few dollars to spare, please consider purchasing this riff (3.99USD) or make a general donation (5USD and up) - they take Bitcoin now too  

Please check out other Rifftrax, Star Trek Enterprise, Battlestar Galactica, DC Comics, documentaries and more at:

and leave any corrections, criticism, comments and requests.

Thanks, bsg4you
